  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerLogic

      public PlayerLogic(int playerNum)
      Instantiates a new Player.
      Parameters:
      playerNum - 1 for player 1, 2 for player 2

  • Method Details

    • moveDownLogically

      public void moveDownLogically()
      Checks if it's possible to move currentPiece down. If so, calls drawPiece and updates coordinates. If not, calls lockSquares and generates a new piece.

    • hardDrop

      public void hardDrop()
      Drops piece as far down the board as possible.

    • moveLeftRight

      public void moveLeftRight(int leftRight)
      Move left or right depending on parameter.
      Parameters:
      leftRight - -1 to move left, 1 for right.

    • rotate

      public void rotate(int direction)
      Rotates the current piece.
      Parameters:
      direction - -1 for counterclockwise, 1 for clockwise.

    • levelUp

      public void levelUp()
      Increases the level if a certain number of lines have been cleared.

    • checkLoss

      public boolean checkLoss()
      Checks to see if the player has lost.
      Returns:
      boolean indicating if the player has lost.

    • drawPiece

      public void drawPiece(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
      Draw the four Squares of a piece based on current state.
      Parameters:
      color - the color
